fields.description:
Description:
Pressing the "Request Hide Keyboard" button in KitchenSink does not hide the keyboard.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Import KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI>Hide Soft Keyboard (Android)
3. Type something in the text field
4. Press "Request Hide Keyboard"

Result: Keyboard does not hide.
Expected: Keyboard should hide after pressing the button.

Note: Bug does not persist in sdk 1.7.5
fields.summary: Android: Keyboard - "Request Hide Keyboard" does not hide the keyboard
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111282022
SDK: 1.8.0.1.v20111123202050
Devices: Nexus S (2.3.6), Droid 3 (2.3.4), Galaxy Tab 10.1 (3.1), Xoom (3.2.1)

comments.body: Occurs on both Rhino and V8.

Bug fixed. Verified on:
SDK: 1.8.0.1.v20111205152904
Runtimes: Android V8/Rhino
Studio: 1.0.7.201112041107
OS: OS X Lion
Devices Tested: Nexus One 2.2.2, Droid3 2.3.4, Slate 3.1, Emulator 4.0
